## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a5bbdacc63f269510ff88a76b84cae8deaa666d09fa9f9272c1463acfdff86e5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tautoake4-hello-world' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
